message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a valuable piece, and I believe you'll find it a great investment. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I'm only able to offer $12000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $12000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $13500, reflecting the value of the product and our potential partnership. This is my best offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $12500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
